tool_description: Detect and censor bad words in text. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/profanityfilter
name: Profanity Filter by API-Ninjas
title: Profanity Filter by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/profanityfilter
api_list.description: API Ninjas Profanity Filter API endpoint. Returns the censored version (bad words replaced with asterisks) of any given text and whether the text contains profanity.
